title: New: Jewellers – Haze (Feat. ATLAS)
body:
Two CitR favourites **Jewellers** and **ATLAS** have teamed up together in a collaboration that screams to be heard in a live performance.

Atmospheric and easily the most upbeat work **ATLAS’s** sumptuous vocals have featured on, there’s hooks aplenty, backed by intricate percussion sections. Whilst both artists are very much blogosphere favourites, with more music of this quality, there’s no reason why they both can’t leave the confines of the internet and spread their wings.
